{"id":615209177,"lang":"cpp","time":"7 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1641600264,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/615209177/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Word Abbreviation","memory":"6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool validWordAbbreviation(string word, string abbr) {\n        int a = 0 ;\n        int w = 0 ;\n        while(w < word.size() && a< abbr.size()){\n           if(abbr[a] == '0'){\n               return false;\n           }\n            \n            int num =0;\n            while(a< abbr.size() && isdigit(abbr[a])){\n                num = num *10 + (abbr[a] -'0');\n                a++;\n            }\n            if(num!=0){\n                w = w+ num;\n            }\n            else{\n                if(word[w]!=abbr[a]){\n                    return false;\n                }\n                a++ ;\n                w++;\n            }\n        }\n        return w == word.size() && a == abbr.size();\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-word-abbreviation"}
